page.title: 19Life on a farm near Nercwys
page.content: I am 13 years old and have always lived at Erw Goed Farm. Indeed my family have lived in the same house since my great-great grandparents moved here in May 1851. Welsh is my first language and I could not speak a word of english until I learnt it in school. When I was 3 I went to nursery school at Glanrafon Welsh School and I stayed at this school until I was 11. Since the age of 3 I have travelled the 4 miles to school by bus. I am now going to the Welsh Comprehensive School, Maes Garmon. My home is in a very lonely spot and I have no friends living near. But every Wednesday night my father takes me down to a Welsh League of Youth club in Mold. I enjoy life on the farm helping my father with the sheep and lambs.
